notes:
# 📝 TL;DR

- Spam no-scope shots into your Tank to farm Cash.

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- Spam no-scope shots at close-mid ranges, mostly focused on healing your team, especially your Tank, to farm a lot of Cash.
- Scope in for long range targets or critical shots that are important to not miss.
- Use Nade to keep your Tank alive and heal them more
- Use Sleep to peel for yourself to prevent avoidable deaths.

---

# ⚡ Power

-  [No Scope Needed](item_823db5eb-5a24-4bac-b850-0aa34e76b4f6): Extra Attack Speed when landing a no-scope shot allows us to spam no scope heals, mostly into our Tank, to easily farm Cash.

---

# 🧰 Items

- [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) are pretty standard choices for increasing our healing output.
- As your final item, you can choose between [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) or [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) depending on the enemy team. Pick [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) if there are any enemies who might be threatening to you, otherwise take [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) as it improves our output to farm more Cash.

# 📝 TL;DR

- You can now spam no scope shots into all your teammates easily to farm Cash.

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- Spam no-scope shots at close-mid range, still mostly focused on healing to farm Cash.
- You can now easily no-scope to duel enemies at closer ranges too and deal more damage.
- Use Biotic Grenade offensively to anti-heal enemies or defensively to save teammates as needed.
- Save Sleep Dart for enemies who get close to help you stay alive.

---

# 🧰 Items

- [Potent Projectiles](item_7e9a8017-9458-4318-aea9-5e80ba7e3c46): Increases no-scope projectile size, making it easier to land heals on allies, boosting Cash farming efficiency.
-  [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e): Improves our healing output further and is very Cash efficient thanks to it's passive.

---

# 💸 Low Cash

- Sell either [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) or [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) to help fund both new items this round.
- Prioritise [Potent Projectiles](item_7e9a8017-9458-4318-aea9-5e80ba7e3c46) over [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) if you need to pick between the two.

---

# 💰 High Cash

- Upgrade [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) to [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) if possible, or any other Rare Weapon Item of your choice.
- If only slightly above budget, grab the remaining Common item between [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) and [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6).

# 📝 TL;DR

- Sleep enemies like crazy to stack [Sleep Regimen](item_28934e4f-0668-482e-b10d-a5d557cc3b1e) for more survivability.

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- Spam Sleep Dart at enemies to stack [Sleep Regimen](item_28934e4f-0668-482e-b10d-a5d557cc3b1e).
- Sleep Dart will last 6 seconds on non-Tank heroes, allowing you to exile an enemy from the teamfight every 8 seconds (Sleep Duration will be 3.6 seconds on Tanks) .
- Enemies like Mercy and Genji who like to hover over the edge of maps should be targeted for easy kills.
- Use Biotic Grenade to follow-up on Slept enemies or defensively to save teammates as needed.
- Spam no-scope shots at close-mid range, keeping allies alive and posing a threat to enemies.
- Scope in for far-range targets or critical shots.

---

# ⚡ Power

-  [Sleep Regimen](item_28934e4f-0668-482e-b10d-a5d557cc3b1e): Provides extra Health, increasing for each Sleep we land. Ana is very vulnerable, so this signifcantly improves our survivability.
- This Power provides an extra 10 Health for each Sleep we land and despite taking this Power at Round 3, **our sleeps from Round 1 and 2 will contribute to this stacking**.

---

# 🧰 Items

-  [Tranquilizer](item_2bea20a0-21c0-4a52-b81e-596c17d184b4): Increases the Sleep Dart's Projectile Size, making it much easier to land Sleeps to contribute to stacking [Sleep Regimen](item_28934e4f-0668-482e-b10d-a5d557cc3b1e). The increased Projectile Speed and additional Sleep Duration mean it's also better to use on enemies at far range.
- Keeping [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) is optimal here, as our [No Scope Needed](item_823db5eb-5a24-4bac-b850-0aa34e76b4f6) and [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) passively increases our Attack Speed, meaning we will reload more often and having more Max Ammo will help reduce how many times we will need to reload.

---

# 💸 Low Cash

- Sell [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf) and [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) to afford  [Tranquilizer](item_2bea20a0-21c0-4a52-b81e-596c17d184b4) if needed.

---

# 💰 High Cash

- If you can afford [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28), buy it. With Season 17's change, it reduces the cooldown on landing the sleep, which is made easy by [Tranquilizer](item_2bea20a0-21c0-4a52-b81e-596c17d184b4), sleeping enemies for 6 seconds and putting Sleep Dart on a 10s cooldown.

- If you only have ~2,500 extra Cash, upgrade [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) to [Stockpile](item_a113eb56-9999-4f22-9bd7-18f4dbd00cc2).
- Extra Cash can be spent on a Weapon Item: [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) ⩺ [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) ⩺ [Stockpile](item_a113eb56-9999-4f22-9bd7-18f4dbd00cc2) ⩺ [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054) ⩺ [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) ⩺ [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) ⩺ [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf).

# 📝 TL;DR

- Use [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e) to help you survive or make plays.
- With the [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28) buff in Season 17, this puts your Sleep Dart on a 10 second cooldown just for landing it, making it so useful at stacking your [Sleep Regimen](item_28934e4f-0668-482e-b10d-a5d557cc3b1e), setting up potential kills or taking enemies out of the fight more often. 

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- Continue the same playstyle from previous rounds, using [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e) for extra evasiveness to stay alive or setup plays.
- The extra Weapon Power makes us much more lethal at duelling enemies with our hipfire shots essentially guaranteeing our ability to land every shot on them.

---

# 🧰 Items

-  [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e): Allows us to double jump to Dash a short distance. This is very good at getting away from threats trying to kill us, or for trying to setup plays by taking more aggressive positions for a Biotic Grenade or to land an extra shot on someone trying to run away.
-  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a): Increased Weapon Power will allow us to output more damage and healing, without increasing how often we'll need to reload.

---

# 💸 Low Cash

- Prioritise purchasing [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e).
- [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) can be substituted for [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f), [Stockpile](item_a113eb56-9999-4f22-9bd7-18f4dbd00cc2) or [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054).

---

# 💰 High Cash

- Extra Cash can be spent on Common and Rare Weapon Items as appropriate: [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) ⩺ [Stockpile](item_a113eb56-9999-4f22-9bd7-18f4dbd00cc2) ⩺ [Aftermarket Firing Pin](item_2485b212-b286-42d0-a2bd-20eb4396b054) ⩺ [Ammo Reserves](item_982d53aa-5ef4-493f-93e7-9e374d0ebf34) ⩺ [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) ⩺ [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf).

- Alternatively, for an extra 1,000 Cash, you can choose to purchase [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) instead of [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e) and [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a). While you miss out on the extra Dash, the item provide extra Health but also enables you much better at keeping allies alive through healing.

# 📝 TL;DR

- Take [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1) if the enemy lacks Cleanse abilities and combo Sleep + Nade to guarantee kills.
- Take [Home Remedy](item_de68ba66-26d5-4136-a0c1-6396d3f1b0c7) otherwise to make sure Nade guarantees saving teammates.

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1): Use Biotic Grenade to slow enemies and make them an easy Sleep Dart target or use Sleep Dart and follow up with Biotic Grenade, to create a similar effect to what the Groggy Perk provides.
- [Home Remedy](item_de68ba66-26d5-4136-a0c1-6396d3f1b0c7): Use Biotic Grenade defensively to save allies.

---

# ⚡ Powers

- [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1): Choose this if the enemy team lacks cleanses or your team is struggling to kill anything. The 50% slow it causes can be pretty brutal.
- [Home Remedy](item_de68ba66-26d5-4136-a0c1-6396d3f1b0c7): Pick this if the enemy team does have cleanses. It's also a great option if the enemies have a lot of healing reduction or anti-heal.


---

# 🧰 Items

- Buy [Grenadius Pin](item_acd985cf-2e74-4e18-8fad-cdaa0837fc78). You may need to sell [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) or [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) to afford this. At this stage, everyone's movement speed is increased and we need the extra range to make sure we land the ability. Ana's cooldowns are too long to afford getting no value from.

- [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1): Buy [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28). Now we can use the Biotic Grenade slow to guarantee our Sleep Dart, which will also lower our Sleep Dart cooldown to 9 seconds.
- [Home Remedy](item_de68ba66-26d5-4136-a0c1-6396d3f1b0c7): Buy [I.V. Drip](item_4993e9c9-738f-4aba-bfbf-c6247ff71af1) for extra survivability - nading yourself will make you 800+ Health.

---

# 💸 Low Cash

- Only purchase the [Grenadius Pin](item_acd985cf-2e74-4e18-8fad-cdaa0837fc78) upgrade this round if lacking Cash. Selling extra green items to cover the cost.

---

# 💰 High Cash

Replace [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a)/[Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) with:

- [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) - direct upgrade.
- [Lethal Dose](item_b919494d-1a33-408a-ba2b-7e3cc24b59c8) - works great with  [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1) to target and bully an enemy.
-  [Cluster Core](item_c63cd7ba-b71c-4503-bdb6-4ef0b0a4bdbb) - works great with  [Home Remedy](item_de68ba66-26d5-4136-a0c1-6396d3f1b0c7).

Or just keep [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) instead of getting [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28).

round_upgrades.notes: Choose this if Anti-Heal or healing reduction is a problem.

This Power is great if your team is struggling to kill things. 

If the enemy has a lot of cleanses, you might want to take Home Remedy instead.

If your team is struggling to kill things because of the cleanses, then take this anyway. Surely they can't cleanse everything your team throws at them.. right?

notes:
# 📝 TL;DR

- We just buff our Weapon Power a bit here to keep up with healing our team alive.

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- Continue using our hipfire shots to heal our team and damage enemies.
- Use our buffed up abilities to have impact on the game, sleeping and nading important enemies and nading important allies we need to keep alive depending on which Round 5 Power we took.
- Use the Cash amounts as an indicator to identify which enemies need to be focused and which allies you should focus on enabling further.

---

# 🧰 Items

- Upgrade [Advanced Nanobiotics](item_26fcf7c9-b81a-4d8e-a459-b515519cb73e) to  [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124).

---

# 💸 Low Cash

- Sell [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28) to afford the upgrade and buy whichever Common item to use leftover Cash.

---

# 💰 High Cash

- [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1): Sell [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28) for [Lethal Dose](item_b919494d-1a33-408a-ba2b-7e3cc24b59c8).
- [Home Remedy](item_de68ba66-26d5-4136-a0c1-6396d3f1b0c7): Sell [I.V. Drip](item_4993e9c9-738f-4aba-bfbf-c6247ff71af1) for [Cluster Core](item_c63cd7ba-b71c-4503-bdb6-4ef0b0a4bdbb).

If you have more Cash, you can sell [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e) for an optional item you can afford.

round_upgrades.notes: Choose this if Anti-Heal or healing reduction is a problem.
If you went for the Time Out Power.

This Power is great if your team is struggling to kill things. 

If the enemy has a lot of cleanses, you might want to take Home Remedy instead.

If your team is struggling to kill things because of the cleanses, then take this anyway. Surely they can't cleanse everything your team throws at them.. right?

notes:
# 📝 TL;DR

- Use AoE Nano Boost as a pseudo-defensive Ultimate to keep our team alive through deadly Ult combos so they could finally stop feeding and maybe win the game already!!

---

# 🎮 Playstyle

- Continue using our hipfire shots to heal our team and damage enemies.
- Use our buffed up abilities to have impact on the game, sleeping/ nading important enemies and nading important allies we need to keep alive. 
- Use the Cash amounts as an indicator to identify which enemies need to be focused and which allies you should focus on enabling further.
- Use Nano Boost to save our team from things that have been wiping them.

---

# ⚡ Power:

- [Our Turn](item_6e0fdb41-c00f-41d9-8ec2-1246b34a539a) converts our Nano Boost into a defensive Ultimate instead. You can still use it offensively, but it's now also about keeping people alive instead of just being used to combo with a teammate.

---

# 🧰 Items

- Replace [Dash Boots](item_1ec670c7-a465-4ca0-9d16-aeeedab7894e) with [Eye of Horus](item_169551ce-e4e5-4a14-9ec4-abdc25673939). This works with [Our Turn](item_6e0fdb41-c00f-41d9-8ec2-1246b34a539a) to Nano Boost everyone around us, even through walls.
- Replace [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28) with [Lethal Dose](item_b919494d-1a33-408a-ba2b-7e3cc24b59c8). In combination with [Time Out](item_34fc2f6c-ecd9-489e-98ca-d08f3eb2fac1), it allows us to guarantee kills on enemies even better. Now when we do the sleep into shoot, nade, shoot, melee combo on a slept enemy, it will do over 450 damage total. Remember, after the Nade, they are slowed by 50% so you can just continue to spam hipfire shots at them. This also gives us 50% Ability Lifesteal, meaning sleeping an enemy will heal us around 80 Health, and our Nade will heal us by around 100 Health.

---

# 💸 Low Cash

- Keep [Double Dose](item_80f07e6e-56f9-40a5-9f5e-ba9005998b28) or swap it for  [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a).

---

# 💰 High Cash

- Replace [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124) with  [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b).

round_upgrades.notes: Choose this if Anti-Heal or healing reduction is a problem.

This Power is great if your team is struggling to kill things. 

If the enemy has a lot of cleanses, you might want to take Home Remedy instead.

If your team is struggling to kill things because of the cleanses, then take this anyway. Surely they can't cleanse everything your team throws at them.. right?
